title: Demi Rose shows ex-boyfriend Chris Martinez what he's missing as she poses in a busty pink bikini
text:
She revealed she had split from her boyfriend of two years, DJ Chris Martinez, last week.

But Demi Rose seemed unfazed by the break-up as she took to Instagram to share her latest sultry snaps, posing by the pool in Los Angeles.

The British model, 24, posed up a storm in a filly pink two-piece, showing off her ample assets and her tiny waist.

Adding a silver cross pendant to her look, Demi wore her chestnut locks tumbling around her shoulders and painted her complexion with a dab of rose to her pout and a slick of mascara to her lashes.

She and the DJ have vowed to continue as friends and to support each other's careers, despite the split.

A representative of the star told MailOnline: 'Unfortunately Demi & her boyfriend Chris Martinez have parted ways.

'They have ended as friends and continue to support each other through out their careers.'

Moving on: Demi Rose seemed unfazed by her recent break-up as she took to Instagram to share her latest sultry snaps, posing by the pool in Los Angeles

Single again: She revealed she had split from her boyfriend of two years, DJ Chris Martinez, last week

They added of the beauty: 'Demi is single and very happy working on her career in the USA.'

Though Demi is no stranger to flaunting her figure on social media, she has kept her relationship with DJ Chris on the down-low, with the former couple having enjoyed a private romance primarily out of the limelight.

The Instagram sensation has garnered the attention of 9.4million followers since she was propelled to fame after being romantically linked to Kylie Jenner's ex Tyga.

The stunning model has also been linked to DJ Tom Zanetti in the past.

In the wake of their split, Demi took to Instagram to share a busty snap, of which she captioned: 'Thinking of you.'

Though it's not known if the message was directed at Chris, in any case the sizzling snap would certainly show him what he's been missing, with the star smouldering into the camera while wearing a frilly, low-cut pink top.

All over: The British model, 24, and the DJ have wowed to continue as friends and vow to support each other's careers

Moving on: 'They have ended as friends and continue to support each other through out their careers'

The beauty further stunned in another steamy Instagram picture shared on Instagram Stories on Friday in which she rocked a perilously plunging zip-up top.

Demi showed off her eye-popping assets in a smouldering snap as she gazed seductively at the camera while using a new Instagram filter on her face which adorned her cheeks with the Christian Dior logo.

Demi looked incredible in a zip-up top which flashed her eye-popping bust to perfection although she seemed to want to draw the eye to her Dior cheeks.

She pulled a perfect pout while drawing the eye further down to her cleavage with the help of a chunky diamond necklace.

Despite her gruelling travelling schedule, the model insisted to MailOnline she sticks to her 'healthy' routine and she admitted nuts are the fattiest foods she eats.

Eye-popping: The beauty further stunned in another steamy Instagram picture shared on Instagram Stories on Friday in which she rocked a perilously plunging zip-up top

In September last year, Demi revealed: 'I try to keep as healthy as I can. With travelling, it's hard to work out, I travel across the world but try to keep my routine.

'Everyone says I'm the healthiest person they know. The fattiest thing I will ever eat is nuts and peanut butter.

'My figure just gains weight so fast. Any bad thing I eat my body isn't used to it and just puts on the weight. That means no birthday cake!

'All I've eaten today is nuts. I've managed to eat a whole pot. I feel guilty as there's a lot of fat in the nuts. That's my treat! So I'm happy!'
description: She revealed she had split from her boyfriend of two years, DJ Chris Martinez, last week.
